assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_For_DeNovo_Initial_Section_C_Criteria_Q5
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Monitoring strategy after eculizumab withdrawal, at a minimum: 1. Twice weekly home urinalysis to detect proteinuria or hematuria, for 6 months 2. Weekly bloodwork evaluating hemolysis parameters and renal function, for 6 months 3. Ongoing investigations after 6 months should be based on clinical judgment 4. The above strategy should be individualized based on clinical judgement
